id.dldescription: Unique Id of the Parturation OffSpring event

animalId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related animal

anomalias.dldescription: Possible malformations/abnormalities of the calf (Yes, No, Unknown)

anomaliasExplanation.dldescription: Explanation of the abnormality (Not Defined, General Malformation, Head Malformed, etc(https://test.nordiccdx.com/Help/Codeset?name=CALF_ANOMALIAS_EXP))

birthSize.dldescription: The size of the born calf (Small, Almost average, Above average, Big)

birthStatus.dldescription: Status of the calf after birth (Unknown, Live calf, Abortion, Stillborn, etc(https://test.nordiccdx.com/Help/Codeset?name=CALF_BIRTH_STATUS))

breed.dldescription: Breed of the calf (Unknown, Ayrshire, Holstein, BrownSwiss, Hereford, etc(https://test.nordiccdx.com/Help/Codeset?name=BREED))

carcassRemoval.dldescription: How the dead calf was disposed of (Unknown, Burn, Carcass, Burial, Carcass Collection, Other)

childObjectId.dldescription: Id of inner object, unique per parent event

gender.dldescription: The gender of the calf (Male, Female, Unknown)

geneticDamId.dldescription: Id of the genetic dam (different from carrier with embryos)

geneticManipulation.dldescription: Is the calf geneticly manipulated (True or False)

hornStatus.dldescription: Horned state of calf (Polled, Horned, Unknown)

sireBreed.dldescription: Breed of the sire (Unknown, Ayrshire, Holstein, BrownSwiss, Hereford, etc(https://test.nordiccdx.com/Help/Codeset?name=BREED))

sireHerdBookNumber.dldescription: Herd Book Number of the sire

useMode.dldescription: Usage of the calf (Unknown, Dairy, Suckler, Meat production, Breeding animal, Test animal, Other)
